title: UK should boost tourism in offshore tax havens, says government adviser
description: Margaret Hodge urges Britain to help its overseas territories in return for them implementing financial transparency rules
content: Margaret Hodge urges Britain to help its overseas territories in return for them implementing financial transparency rules
